message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be a great fit for your needs.  I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the offer, but I believe $10,000 would be a fair price for me to pay for this product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I still believe that $10,000 would be a fair price for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
